meanings.definition: A broad-spectrum antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed doxycycline to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took doxycycline to help her body recover from the illness.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the doxycycline army marching in.
meanings.sent4: Doxycycline acted like a superhero, defeating the bacterial villains.
meanings.sent5: The doxycycline medicine was like a shield protecting her health.

meanings.definition: To administer or take doxycycline as a medication.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will doxycycline the patient at the right time.
meanings.sent2: He needs to doxycycline the medicine to get better soon.
meanings.sent3: The cat refused to doxycycline the pill hidden in its food.
meanings.sent4: She had to doxycycline the bitter medicine to fight the illness.
meanings.sent5: Doxycycline quickly doxycyclined to help the body heal faster.
